subject: Re: [junit] @Before shouldn't declared static?!
msgSnippet: Yep, that s a documentation bug.  Can you report it on the issue tracker linked here? http://sourceforge.net/projects/junit Many thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Yep, that's a documentation bug. Can you report it on the issue
tracker linked here?

http://sourceforge.net/projects/junit

Many thanks,

David Saff

On 2/21/07, shahar.daniel <shahar.daniel@...> wrote:
> This is from the javadoc of junit (seems like @Before shouldn't
> declared static):
>
> public class Example {
> List empty;
> @Before public static void initialize() {
> empty= new ArrayList();
> }
> @Test public void size() {
> ...
> }
> @Test public void remove() {
> ...
> }
> }
> this the original page:
> http://junit.sourceforge.net/javadoc_40/org/junit/Before.html
>
> if I'm right how do I report this error?
> tnx
> Shahar
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
